alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 7:42PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Potential total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. North wind frequently gusting 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains West, Bighorn Mountains Southeast, Northeast Johnson County and Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible as the snow and wind combine to create reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near white-out conditions will be possible along Interstate 90 given the combination of a northerly crosswind and snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. This storm has the potential to create widespread travel impacts.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
